alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 11 at 1:08PM MST until December 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County, East Platte County, Goshen County and East Laramie County. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County
